document.full_text: though five games is an absurdly small sample size, only one team in the wild-card era, the 1995 cincinnati reds, has reached the postseason after starting 0-5.
document.title: on baseball: 0-5 red sox are looking for answers
lines_and_colors: though five games is an absurdly small sample size, only one team in the wild-card era, the 1995 cincinnati reds, has reached the postseason after starting 0-5.
